202001.n: Special Topics in CS: Parallel Computer Architecture

catList: This course focuses on the design principles of parallel computer architectures. The course covers the following topics: •	Instruction-Level Parallelism: Superscalar Architectures, Speculative Execution •	Multicore-/Multiprocessor-Architectures, Interconnection Networks •	Caches in Shared Memory Architectures, Cache-Coherency •	Shared Memory Architectures and Memory Consistency •	Quantitative Principles of Computer Architectures •	Vector Architectures, Systolic Arrays, GPUs •	Case Studies and Emerging Trends
